channel.title: [Delta]Teleport help!
channel.description: Now I know how to make portals/object clicking teleports you, yet I would like to know how to make it where I click on a portal for example I would put up a menu in the chat box letting me choose a place to teleport such as I can pickup to teleport to giant mole or to king black dragon? Thanks for your help

item.title: [Delta]Teleport help!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“MrFun, post:5, topic:472856”]So I basicaly copied the dragon portal teleport

if ((objectID == 6551) && (objectX == 3090) && (objectY == 3489)) { teleEffect = 2; teleEffect = 3; sendQuest("Choose a God", 2470); sendQuest("Saradomin", 2471); sendQuest("Bandos", 2472); sendQuest("Armadyl", 2473); sendFrame164(2469); }
yet have really no clue what to do when I click saradomin the king black dragon info thing pops up and when I click bandos I teleport to king black dragon…is there a tut on this?[/quote]
Most likely.
You need to add some sort of check to make sure what what button is being clicked… I’m saying, not just to check that the button has been clicked, but to see that it was that button exactly.

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta]Teleport help!
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

So I basicaly copied the dragon portal teleport

if ((objectID == 6551) && (objectX == 3090) && (objectY == 3489)) { teleEffect = 2; teleEffect = 3; sendQuest("Choose a God", 2470); sendQuest("Saradomin", 2471); sendQuest("Bandos", 2472); sendQuest("Armadyl", 2473); sendFrame164(2469); }
yet have really no clue what to do when I click saradomin the king black dragon info thing pops up and when I click bandos I teleport to king black dragon…is there a tut on this?

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta]Teleport help!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

case 9168 is the action button from when you click an item in the dialogue.
as for teleEffect = 3; Well… I won’t lie, I’ve never seen that before… But I assume it’s used to differentiate the teleport methods.

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta]Teleport help!
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

sk8rdude461:

You need get the action button and make it so that action button teleports you

Okay heres a code I found
Client

if ((objectID == 7319) && (objectX == 3090) && (objectY == 3487)) { teleEffect = 3; sendQuest("Danger", 2470); sendQuest("Info", 2471); sendQuest("Yes.", 2472); sendQuest("No.", 2473); sendFrame164(2469); }

ClickingMost

case 9168: if(c.teleEffect == 1) c.triggerTele(3244, 3518, 0); if(c.teleEffect == 2) c.closeInterface(); if(c.teleEffect == 3) c.triggerTele(2273, 4695, 0); c.sM("WARNING! You have been teleported to the KBD, Watch out for pkers!"); c.sM("Use the lever south of here to exit"); break;

Im confused on what the
clickingMost
“case 9168:” is from
and the
Client
“teleEffect = 3;” is from

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta]Teleport help!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“MrFun, post:1, topic:472856”]Now I know how to make portals/object clicking teleports you, yet I would like to know how to make it where I click on a portal for example I would put up a menu in the chat box letting me choose a place to teleport such as I can pickup to teleport to giant mole or to king black dragon?
Thanks for your help[/quote]
You need get the action button and make it so that action button teleports you

Read full topic
